AIModel.msdyn_name: Power Apps Grid Extensions - AI Helper

AIConfiguration.msdyn_customconfiguration:
{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-2","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"Analyze this JSON schema, it represents the columns' metadata (Display Name, Logical Name and Type.Value) of a visualization.
"},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"json_schema"},{"type":"literal","text":"
 
Combining the user request, the documentation, available customizers per type and best practices, suggest 1~3 customizers for each column and justify why is it valuable, include an accuracy ranking.
"},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"user_request"},{"type":"literal","text":" 

Documentation Schema:
{"customizers":[{"name":"Any [Navigate Buttons]","type":900,"availableColumns":["Any"],"description":"Enables navigation buttons for forms related to the row.","whenToUse":"Use when you want to open Modal","formId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000","tabName":"tab_name","height":{"value":80,"unit":"%"},"width":{"value":70,"unit":"%"}}],"sidePane":[{"label":"Side Only]","type":901,"availableColumns":["Any"],"description":"Makes read-only columns editable.","whenToUse":"Use to override read-only behavior and allow editing directly in the logic.","jsonSchema":{"reference":"column/row","column":"yp_accountid","viewId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000010","viewName":"Related Phone name='statuscode' width='100' /></row></grid>"}},{"name":"Any [Dependent Colorful Cell]","type":904,"availableColumns":["Any"],"description":"Determines cell color based on another columns value and defined ranges.","whenToUse":"Use to visually differentiate rows based on a secondary column [Upload Download]","type":600,"availableColumns":["File"],"description":"Visualize, upload, download, or delete files in the grid.","whenToUse":"Use when working with file columns to manage attachments inline.","jsonSchema":{"readOnly":false,"allowedTypes":["jpg","jpeg","png","gif"]}}],"columnTypeMappings":[{"Label":"Boolean","Value":0},{"Label":"Customer","Value":1},{"Label":"DateTime","Value":2},{"Label":"Decimal","Value":3},{"Label":"Double","Value":4},{"Label":"Integer","Value":5},{"Label":"Lookup","Value":6},{"Label":"Memo","Value":7},{"Label":"Money","Value":8},{"Label":"Owner","Value":9},{"Label":"PartyList","Value":10},{"Label":"Picklist","Value":11},{"Label":"State","Value":12},{"Label":"Status","Value":13},{"Label":"String","Value":14},{"Label":"Uniqueidentifier","Value":15},{"Label":"CalendarRules","Value":16},{"Label":"Virtual","Value":17},{"Label":"BigInt","Value":18},{"Label":"ManagedProperty","Value":19},{"Label":"EntityName","Value":20}]}

Instructions for the output schema:
- displayname: use exactly value (DisplayName) [string]
- logicalname: use the exactly value (LogicalName) [string]
- type: use the exactly value (Type.Value) [number]
- customizers: [complex array object]
- title: Suggest a small title no more then 50 characters [string]
- type: Suggest a customizer option [number]
- jsonSchema: Suggest some parameters compatible with the type, always include all json properties
- accuracy: How fit this suggestion match with the request
- description: Why this is relevant

Restrictions:
- Only retrieve the JSON
- Do not include nothing out of JSON
- Do not return as a markdown text"}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"json_schema","text":"json_schema","type":"text","quickTestValue":"{"id":"0573cd72-d62a-f011-8c4e-000d3ac04b80","name":"DEMO Page
